bibl.title: What is Hellenistic Law? The Documents of the Judaean Desert in the Light of the Papyri from Egypt.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert
bibl.author: MODRZEJEWSKI, (MÉLÈZE ) Joseph

bibl.note: I. Hellenistic law and Hellenistic culture: 1. Legal history and "the seven wonders of the world"; - 2. Greek contribution and local traditions; - 3. Coexistence and interaction. - II. Marriage and family: the permanence of Hellenistic law: 1. Marriage; - 2. Family structures; - 3. Succession. - [Conclusion.]
